title: "I Do" in Las Vegas: Memories and Experiences of a Las Vegas Wedding Chapel Minister
description: This is a delightful and entertaining journal of experiences, impressions and memories of a Las Vegas Wedding Chapel minister who has performed over 12,000 weddings on The Strip and in Casino Wedding Chapels, in and around Las Vegas, Nevada - billed as "The Wedding Capital of the World." In this book, Bishop Michelina presents the engaging atmosphere found in this Nevada City which features casinos, a few trade secrets of the wedding industry, and the unusual couples, requests and events occurring during the ceremonies: including Chapel weddings, Elvis weddings, helicopter and hot air balloon weddings, and tours of the Grand Canyon, Red Rock, Valley of Fire. All these represent part of the lure and fascination a Las Vegas destination holds. Sample wedding ceremonies and pictures complete the chapters - creatively outlined within the words of the Wedding Ceremony itself.
author: Bishop Michelina T. Foster
